code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{createLogger}from"redux-logger";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import rootReducer from"../reducers";import rootSaga from"../sagas";var logger=createLogger();var saga=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(rootReducer,undefined,applyMiddleware(saga,logger));saga.run(rootSaga);export default store;
